data.title: The Invisible war
data.meta_description: "...a groundbreaking investigation into one of America's most disturbing secrets: the epidemic of rape within the U.S. military. Focusing on the powerful stories of several young veterans, the film is a moving examination of the staggering personal and societal costs of these assaults."--Container.
